channel.title: My vengance
channel.description: Hey i made vengance and i made it so it hit everyone, but now if someone is like lvl 1 varrock and does vengance everyone even get hit at ghorock by it. [code] attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1); [/code] i think thats it to make it multi and i got another problem that is, when people are for example out of wildy and someone is in lvl 1 then the guy out of wildy click on the veng emote, then the person in wild gets hit thats dumb how can i disable that?

item.title: My vengance
item.dc:creator: @leetzone leetzone
item.description:
@leetzone wrote:

Hey i made vengance and i made it so it hit everyone, but now if someone is like lvl 1 varrock and does vengance everyone even get hit at ghorock by it.

    attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1);

i think thats it to make it multi
and i got another problem that is, when people are for example out of wildy and someone is in lvl 1
then the guy out of wildy click on the veng emote, then the person in wild gets hit thats dumb
how can i disable that?

Read full topic
